description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。复旦大学化学系分析化学专业毕业。曾任中共江苏句容县委副书记、县长，镇江市副市长、市长、市委书记、市人大常委会主任，江苏省人大常委会副主任等职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. Graduated from the Department of Chemistry at Fudan University with a major in Analytical Chemistry. He has held various positions including Deputy Secretary of the CPC Jurong County Committee and County Mayor, Deputy Mayor, Mayor, Party Secretary, and Director of the Standing Committee of the Municipal People's Congress of Zhenjiang City, and Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的一个旧县名，是方之焯的出生地。
description.en: A former county in Zhejiang Province, and the birthplace of Fang Zhizhuo.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所顶尖研究型大学。
description.en: A top research university located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省镇江市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Zhenjiang City, Jiangsu Province, China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党镇江市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党镇江市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省镇江市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Zhenjiang City, Jiangsu Province.

nodes.id: 江苏省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 江苏省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the People's Congress of Jiangsu Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，方之焯在镇江市市长和市委书记职位上的前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, predecessor to Fang Zhizhuo as Mayor and Party Secretary of Zhenjiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，方之焯在中共镇江市委书记职位上的继任者。
description.en: A Chinese politician, successor to Fang Zhizhuo as Party Secretary of Zhenjiang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，方之焯在镇江市市长职位上的继任者。
description.en: A Chinese politician, successor to Fang Zhizhuo as Mayor of Zhenjiang.

description.zh-cn: 方之焯出生于浙江镇海。
description.en: Fang Zhizhuo was born in Zhenhai, Zhejiang.

description.zh-cn: 方之焯毕业于复旦大学化学系分析化学专业。
description.en: Fang Zhizhuo graduated from the Department of Chemistry at Fudan University, majoring in Analytical Chemistry.

description.zh-cn: 方之焯是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Fang Zhizhuo is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 方之焯于1992年3月至1994年10月期间担任镇江市人民政府市长。
description.en: Fang Zhizhuo served as the Mayor of the Zhenjiang Municipal People's Government from March 1992 to October 1994.

relationships.target: 中国共产党镇江市委员会

description.zh-cn: 方之焯于1994年10月至2001年1月期间担任中共镇江市委书记。
description.en: Fang Zhizhuo served as the Secretary of the CPC Zhenjiang Municipal Committee from October 1994 to January 2001.

relationships.target: 江苏省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 方之焯于2001年2月至2008年1月期间担任江苏省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: Fang Zhizhuo served as the Deputy Director of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress from February 2001 to January 2008.

description.zh-cn: 钱永波是方之焯在镇江市人民政府市长和中国共产党镇江市委员会书记两个职位上的前任。
description.en: Qian Yongbo was the predecessor to Fang Zhizhuo for the positions of Mayor of Zhenjiang Municipal People's Government and Secretary of the CPC Zhenjiang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 张卫国接替方之焯出任中国共产党镇江市委员会书记。
description.en: Zhang Weiguo succeeded Fang Zhizhuo as the Secretary of the CPC Zhenjiang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周大平接替方之焯出任镇江市人民政府市长。
description.en: Zhou Daping succeeded Fang Zhizhuo as the Mayor of the Zhenjiang Municipal People's Government.
